summary: Adds undead hounds to draugr crypts.
descriptionHtml:
Vargr 1.0
[i]Undead hounds that haunt the crypts along their draugr masters.[/i]

[b]Requires Dawnguard![/b]

This is basically a retexture of the Death Hound without the collar. The idea came to me when I lamented on the boredom of Skyrim's crypts. So figured that some variety to the enemies encountered among the draugr. You can encounter a few of these draugr hounds in every nordic crypt. A few of them are assigned to Â special factions. Haven't done extensive beta-testing, other than that I know the creature itself should work fine. Cleaned with TES5EDIT.
You can use this freely in your own mods. No need to credit either, but you can if you want to be nice.
author: Viltuska
